Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INTERNET AND TECHNOLOGY
REPORTED AND COMMITTED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to the payment of ransom in the event of a cyber incident or a cyber ransom or ransomware attack
Summary: Prohibits governmental entities, business entities and health care entities from paying a ransom in the event of a cyber incident or a cyber ransom or ransomware attack.
LawCode: Add Art 4 ยง401, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to the payment of ransom in the event of a cyber incident or a cyber ransom or ransomware attack
